description: There are many ways to enjoy these flavoursome Asian meatballs. Try them in a rice bowl, over noodles or stuffed in a roll.
keywords: Meatballs,Microwave,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Mince,Pork,Healthier Easier,Sesame free
name: 4Step Asian Pork Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine mince, spring onion, ginger and garlic in a bowl. Finely chop coriander root and 3cm of stalks. Remove coriander sprigs and set aside. Add chopped coriander to mince. Stir until well combined. Form tablespoons of mixture into balls and place on a plate.

Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Spray with oil. Add meatballs and cook for 10 minutes, shaking pan occasionally, or until meatballs are browned all over. Add 1/2 cup water and bring to the boil.
Transfer mixture to a shallow baking dish and place in oven. Bake meatballs for 10 minutes or until cooked through.
Cook microwave rice as per packet instructions. Serve meatballs with coleslaw mixed with carrot and rice. Top with coriander sprigs.
